Name: Pixel Speedrun
About the game: Hi! Once a small project, now on Steam! A few years ago I made a game that had found great favor in the Scirra community. With still increasing 150'000+ plays it ended up on the third page of the top games. This motivated me extremely to create a new game. New/More Levels New Obstacles a... proper Timer Endscreen Stats / Graphs to compare your run to your Personal Best I am really happy to have made it to this point. Thank you to everyone who supports my project!
